clauses.title: Purpose
clauses.body: This LOI outlines main terms for {{subject_matter}} between {{buyer}} and {{seller}}.

clauses.title: Intent
clauses.body: Both parties express genuine interest in negotiating a definitive agreement by {{expected_close_date}}.

clauses.title: Non-Binding
clauses.body: Except for confidentiality and exclusivity, this LOI is non-binding.
